Booked tickets for 4 people and 1 pair of 4 private teachings at 12:30. I arrived nearby at 1125 but couldn't find the entrance to the snow field. I asked the reception to send a location, but only sent me a photo to ask me to find, saying that the location is not accurate. I really want to know how difficult it is to send an entrance on WeChat, and the reception is not willing to send it. Counting, I found it myself, 1138 I arrived at the entrance of the snow field and notified the reception staff, but I waited until 1218 the reception staff showed up to give me a ticket, I could go to pick up the ticket and change the equipment, and it was all 1248. So almost 1300 did not start school, and the class ended at 1430. If I'm late, that's my problem, but I wait for the reception staff more than half an hour, do I have to bear the time loss?

It used to be convenient to have a free Ski Park Bus in Mingdong, a ski resort near Seoul. Skiing costs about 500 yuan a day, which is slightly more expensive than skiing in Beijing, but the supporting facilities of the ski resort are really comparable in China. The snow is also very good. The snow track here is very long. It can really be smooth.

In addition, there are ice and snow paradise, sweat steaming room and water paradise in the resort. It is not cheap to buy on-site, and it will be better to buy a set of tickets online. There is a 94 degree sweat steaming room, I also look, see someone out of the body smoking, ice and snow park has several good concave shape, and ski resort must buy a cable car ticket, otherwise it can only be smooth and boring.

The Daming Vivaldi Park ski resort on Jiangyuan Road is a very modern public ski resort. The slope here is very steep and the slide is very long. It's very exciting to slide down from the top of the mountain. And the snow is very soft and clean, skiing experience is very good.

There are many types of snow roads! fully furnished! The price is not expensive! The disadvantage is that it is a bit far away. It takes about 1.5 to two hours by car, and the traffic jam when you come back...
It is a popular ski resort, natural ski track, also suitable for beginners, can participate in a one-day tour, experience the fun of skiing.

Daming ski resort is really big. There are several ski tracks. For those of us who can't ski very well, we can only use the beginner's lane. See many Korean local children are skiing karate, very envious ah. Although the coach of our regiment needs to take a lot of people with him, he is really serious. He also has a translator to help us explain that he will ski again if he has the chance next time.
Daming Vivaldi Park ski resort, Japan's largest ski resort, the environment here is quite good, like skiing friends must not miss this place, it is highly recommended.
This is a favorite place for young people. Although they can't ski, it's interesting to try to learn it.

Vivaldi Park Skiing Ground is one of the most popular skiing grounds on this side of Jiangyuan Road, and you can sign up for a one-day skiing tour in Seoul. It's a little far from Seoul, and I think a two-day tour is better.
The snow here is very beautiful, very beautiful, very big ski resort, very happy to play.

Many Koreans like to come here during the holiday, away from the city, enjoy the freshness of nature, the environment here is very good, many plants, the coverage is very high, the negative ion composition in the air is also very high, very nourishing!

The environment of Longren's natural cultivation and forest is still very good. Many plant air is particularly fresh. The environment is also very beautiful. The surrounding traffic is very convenient. Many people especially like to come here for vacation!

It's cool because there are many trees on hot days. The playground is also good, so it's good to go with children
